sub_title: Upper School MYP & DP Dutch & French Teacher - Language & Literature + Language Acquisition  -  'Eerstegraads bevoegd'  - Google for Education Certified Trainer
summary:
Joyce van Ruiten, MA. MSc. MEd. I am an experienced language teacher with Master degrees in French Linguistics and Literature, Communication Science and Education ('First degree'/Eerstegraads). Since 2000 I teach French and Dutch at different levels and to different age groups - since 2009 at the International School of Amsterdam. 
In my classes I use innovative educational techniques, such as Google for Education - I am a Google for Education Certified Trainer- , CI/TPR Storytelling and Visible Thinking Strategies. 
The International School of Amsterdam is an IB school and I am trained in and experienced with the IB curriculum.
